local_llm_description: The image presents a graph that displays the Glitch Energy of a device, which is measured in 5V and 12bit. The device's energy consumption can be seen as a function of time, with the x-axis representing time (in hours) and the y-axis representing energy consumed (in units). The graph shows a falling edge at the top right corner, indicating that the energy consumption has been decreasing over time.

external_llm_result.title: LDAC Clock Feedthrough (Code 81h to 801h)
external_llm_result.summary: Scope capture of larger downward step showing LDAC clock feedthrough and settling.

structured_data.description: VOUT scale 5 mV/div, LDAC trigger pulse 5 V/div, timebase 2 us/div; annotated transition 81h to 801h.
